colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(CES SHING SHES PAR BRJOD NAS ME TOG CHAR 'BEBS, DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG SKYA RINGS DKAR PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI MCHED 'GROG AE MCHI BKA' BCU PA DANG NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN GNYIS GZHAN LA PHAN BSAM GYIS SOG YUL 'DI GAR ME LHA MCHOD CING GA-YANG BLANGS PA'I BKRA SHIS PA 'BYUNG 'DUG KYANG KYANG LHAR BSKYED PA MCHOD PA BYIN RLABS SOGS YIG TSIG LTAR CAN GYI LUG 'DZIN PA 'GA' SNANG NGO, ,RANG RE LA LHAR BSKYED PA'I ME MCHOD ZHIG BYED DGOS ZHES BSKUL NGO MCHOG PAR SBYIN SREG GI THAB BSKYED DANG SLOB DPON PADMA'I MDZAD PA'I GA-YANG 'GUGS CHEN MO'I GA-YANG 'GUGS BYED @009B KYI TSIG 'GA' ZHIG BSDUS NAS RAB 'BYAMS NGAG DBANG BSOD NAMS KYIS MDZAD PA'I STENG DU NYER SPYOD LNGA SPEL TSIG DANG BCAS PA LUG GI BRANG DANG MAR KHU CHANG 'BUL SOGS NI, NOM CHI KO'U SHRI CHOS RJE BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYI SUG BRIS SO, ,DGE LEGS BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
